subject: [Radiance-general] What is the Tone Mapping Function in WinImage?
body:
yijun huang wrote:

Hi Yijun,

Are you referring to the "human sensitivity" exposure option in
Winimage?  This is provided by the pcond program in the Radiance
distribution.  The chief reference for that delightful little
program--aside from the man page--is this paper:

radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/papers/lbnl39882/tonemap.pdf

- Rob
